text: Apani pabena na allaha o akhiratera upara imanadara emana kono sampradaya, yara bhalabase taderake yara allaha o tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana kare --- hoka na e birud'dhacarira tadera pita, putra, bha'i athaba edera jnati-gotra. Edera antare allaha likhe diyechena imana ebam taderake saktisali karechena tamra paksa theke ruha dbara [1]. Ara tini taderake prabesa karabena emana jannate, yara padadese nadisamuha prabahita; sekhane tara sthayi habe; allaha tadera prati santusta hayechena ebam tara'o tamra prati santusta.
